div.p: Simplified Cluster Management provides faster recovery from failures through new performance optimizations and easier management of Splunk Apps in a distributed clustered environment. Splunk admins do not need to visit every cluster node to deploy an app.

ul.li: Enhanced Cluster Monitoring UI: Ability to monitor the health of the cluster through a centralized dashboard
Auto Rebalancing of Peers: Ability to distribute the loads evenly among the cluster peers
Faster Recovery: Ability to recover from peer failures through copying of TSIDX files instead of regeneration
Apps Management: Ability to manage and distribute all apps to peers through cluster master

div.p: To uset this feature you need to have a Splunk Cluster set up. Once you have your cluster set up you can use the cluster management feature to manage and monitor your clusters. There are a couple of key activities that use Cluster management:
